property.name: commodity
property.label: Commodity
property.description: Selected commodity for the current process

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Record Id of the parent Object

property.name: servicePointId
property.label: Service Point Id
property.description: Service Point Id

property.name: object
property.label: Object
property.description: The parent Object of the Reading

property.name: nextLabel
property.label: Next Label
property.description: The Label of the Next Button

property.name: nextVariant
property.label: Next variant
property.description: The variant of the next button

property.name: isVolture
property.label: Is Volture?
property.description: Discriminates if the process is a Volture

property.name: isRettificaConsumi
property.label: Rettifica Consumi?
property.description: Discriminates if the process is Rettifica Consumi

property.name: selectedReadingValue
property.label: Lettura Selezionata da cruscotto letture
property.description: Lettura Selezionata da cruscotto letture, solo per processo Rettifica Consumi

property.name: selectedReadingsList
property.label: Elenco valori letture selezionate da cruscotto letture
property.description: Letture Selezionate da cruscotto letture, solo per processo Rettifica Consumi

property.name: resumedFromDraft
property.label: Resumed from Draft?
property.description: Discriminates if the case has been resumed from Draft

property.name: showDraftButton
property.label: Show Draft Button?
property.description: Whether to show the Draft Button

property.name: showBackButton
property.label: Show Back Button?
property.description: Whether to show the Back Button

property.name: showCancelButton
property.label: Show Cancel Button?
property.description: Whether to show the Cancel Button

property.name: allowSmallerReading
property.label: Allow Smaller Reading?
property.description: If true the user can insert a reading smaller than the last one

property.name: saveDraft
property.label: Save In Draft
property.description: If true save in Draft

property.name: cancelCase
property.label: Cancel Case?
property.description: If true call the cancellation flow

property.name: readingCustomerDate
property.label: Reading Customer Date
property.description: Date of reading provided by customer

property.name: oldTotalReadingValue
property.label: Old total reading value
property.description: Sum of all previous reading values

property.name: newTotalReadingValue
property.label: New total reading value
property.description: Sum of all new reading values

property.name: disabledReadingDate
property.label: Disabled Reading Date
property.description: If true reading date is disabled

property.name: tipizzazioneRettificaConsumi
property.label: Tipizzazione Rettifica Consumi
property.description: La tipizzazione della Rettifica Consumi: Errore Stima Consumi o Errore di Lettura
